Terrain::TerrainMap

Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE > Class Template Reference

This is the basis for all image/maps in terrain, for example height maps, texture layer maps, shadow maps and hole maps. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename TYPE>
class Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >

This is the basis for all image/maps in terrain, for example height maps, texture layer maps, shadow maps and hole maps.

virtual uint32 Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >::height (  )  const [pure virtual]

This function returns the height of the TerrainMap.

Returns:
The height of the TerrainMap.

Implemented in Terrain::HorizonShadowMap1, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap1, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer1, Terrain::HorizonShadowMap2, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap2, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer2, and Terrain::DominantTextureMap.

template<typename TYPE>
virtual ImageType const& Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >::image (  )  const [pure virtual]

This function accesses the TerrainMap as though it is an image.

This function should only be called within a lock/unlock pair.

Returns:
The TerrainMap as an image.

Implemented in Terrain::HorizonShadowMap1, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap1, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer1, Terrain::HorizonShadowMap2, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap2, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer2, and Terrain::DominantTextureMap.

template<typename TYPE>
Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >::Iterator Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >::iterator ( int  x,
int  y 
) [inline, virtual]

This function returns an iterator over the map.

This function should only be called within a lock/unlock pair.

Parameters:
x The x coordinate.
y The y coordinate.
Returns:
An iterator that can be used to access the underlying image.

template<typename TYPE>
virtual bool Terrain::TerrainMap< TYPE >::load ( DataSectionPtr  dataSection,
std::string *  error = NULL 
) [pure virtual]

This function loads the TerrainMap from a DataSection that was saved via TerrainMap::save.

You should not call this between lock/unlock pairs.

Parameters:
dataSection The DataSection to load from.
error If not NULL and an error occurs then this will be set to a reason why the error occured.
Returns:
True if the load was successful.

Implemented in Terrain::HorizonShadowMap1, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap1, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer1, Terrain::DominantTextureMap2, Terrain::HorizonShadowMap2, Terrain::TerrainHeightMap2, Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer2, and Terrain::TerrainTextureLayer.
